name: mad-cartographer-free-maps
title: The MAD Cartographer | Free Battlemap Pack
description: This free map pack from The MAD Cartographer includes 48 scenes with pre-built walls, ambient sounds, dynamic lighting, and journal entries providing details on how to use the maps. This pack is a subset of the complete maps collection available through his Patreon, which includes many additional maps and variations and map themes. This module comes with a Scenes and a Journal Compendium.
author: TheMADCartographer
